typeProperties.script:
source(output(

		id as integer,
		name as string,
		country as string,
		full_name as string,
		birthdate as string,
		birthplace as string,
		died as string,
		date_of_death as string,
		age as string,

		bowling_t20s_ave as string,

		bowling_t20s_sr as string,
		bowling_t20s_4w as string,
		bowling_t20s_5w as string,
		bowling_t20s_10 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 20,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ReadPlayerRecord
ReadPlayerRecord split(equals(country,'India'),
	disjoint: true) ~> SplitIndianPlayer@(IndianPlayer, OtherPlayer)
SplitIndianPlayer@IndianPlayer sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['IndianPlayer.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		column_a,
		id,
		name,
		country,
		full_name,
		birthdate,
		birthplace,
		died,
		date_of_death,
		age,
		major_teams,
		batting_style,
		bowling_style,
		other,
